page.title: 11FAVOURITE ACTIVITY
page.content:
My favourite activity is going on the computer.I like going on the computer because it is fun . I especially like typeing things on to it.One of my favourite games is Granny's Garden.First you start of outside a cave then it says do you have a password if you don't you go to the witchs house and if you do have the password you find the first to children who are calld Esther and Tom.then you have to find four more children but if you meet the witch you get sent back to the start.
BY GARETH MCCONNELL.
